title: Stadia will get Ubisoft’s free-to-play Roller Champions at a ‘later date’
content:
As confirmed last week, Ubisoft is bringing its new game Roller Champions to Stadia. Today, the publisher officially announced everything about the upcoming free-to-play game, as well as announcing that it won’t launch day-and-date on Stadia.

more…

The post Stadia will get Ubisoft’s free-to-play Roller Champions at a ‘later date’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ubisoft has confirmed it will bring its free-to-play game Roller Champions to Google Stadia, but at a "later date" versus other platforms.
